Hello my name is Babahle Mokone

I help businesses grow, increase their reputation and have a strong online presence by designing and developing enticing and effective websites

ABOUT

I am a front-end web developer situated in Johannesburg South Africa. I work with newly established businesses and also small businesses. My Coding journey started when I was 15 years old. An interest in computers and how they work sparked the flame that made me go on this journey of being a web developer. In my spare time, I enjoy playing video games and watching anime.
